p: Method 1: Him (212 mg, 3.12 mmol) and 1 (121 mg, 0.123 mmol) were dissolved in 2 mL hot water. The solution was cooled to room temperature to give yellow crystals. The crystals were washed with cold water and dried under vacuum. Yield: 122 mg (91.2%). Anal. Calcd for C 55H 44N 7P 2Re·3H 2O: C, 59.77; H, 4.56; N, 8.87%. Found: C, 59.82; H, 4.49; N, 8.76%. 1H NMR in CD 3CN/ppm: 6.92 (s, 2H, Him), 7.61 (s, 1H, Him), 7.64–7.94 (40H, PPh 4 +), 10.09 (br, 1H, Him). UV–vis/nm in the solid state: 408. IR (KBr pellet)/cm –1: 2129 (ν C≡N), 2115 (ν C≡N), 2105 (ν C≡N), 2098 (ν C≡N).
